body: If this is the only difference from the lambda shape function in "Slice", please refactor the function and put it in [common_shape_fns.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/common_shape_fns.cc) instead. Please see [_MklConcat](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/array_ops.cc#L3059) for example.
body_html: If this is the only difference from the lambda shape function in "Slice", please refactor the function and put it in common_shape_fns.cc instead. Please see _MklConcat for example.
body_text: If this is the only difference from the lambda shape function in "Slice", please refactor the function and put it in common_shape_fns.cc instead. Please see _MklConcat for example.
